description: MCP server for secure database access (PostgreSQL, MySQL, SQLite)

environmentVariables.name: DATALINK_ANALYTICS_URL
environmentVariables.description: Database connection URL. Pattern: DATALINK_<NAME>_URL where <NAME> identifies the database. Supports postgresql://, mysql://, or file path for SQLite.

environmentVariables.name: DATALINK_ANALYTICS_READONLY
environmentVariables.description: Set to 'true' for read-only access. Pattern: DATALINK_<NAME>_READONLY
